v1.headline: Founder | Follow for posts on Resilience, Mindset & Personal Growth | Ex-Lawyer | Oxford Grad | #1 Female Creator in Startups & Entrepreneurship
v1.about:
Looking to build your resilience, mindset and personal growth? You’re in the right place.

I share practical tools, stories and insights that help people grow through challenges and show up with confidence.

My work draws on lived experience: surviving leukaemia with a 20% survival chance, rebuilding my life, starting my international legal career, and co-founding an award-winning wellness brand with my sister.

Here’s how I can support you:

→ Speaking at events and panels on navigating hard chapters and growing through them
→ Weekly newsletter, Rise on Purpose, packed with actionable tips for life and work
→ Daily content on resilience, mindset and growing through life’s challenges

The story so far:

2012: Diagnosed with acute myeloid leukaemia; my sister became my stem-cell donor and saved my life
2013: Hospitalised in protective isolation for months, and helped raise £60K+ for leukaemia research
2014: Hair grew back and strength slowly returned, I made it back to law school and began my legal career
2016: Manifested a dream from hospital when I moved to New York to work in corporate law
2017: Relocated to the British Virgin Islands and lived through Hurricane Irma
2018: Returned to the UK and co-founded skincare By Sarah with my sister
2019: Featured in Vogue, Forbes, The Times and Marie Claire for the first time
2020: During Covid, started sharing the mindset tools that helped me through isolation in hospital
2022: Completed Goldman Sachs 10KSB in partnership with Oxford University
2024: Secured retail listings with Ocado, Planet Organic and Healf
2025: Grew my audience to 70K+ and ranked #1 Female Creator globally in Startups & Entrepreneurship
Now: Sharing what I’ve learned through talks, panels and brand partnerships

If you’re looking for a thoughtful perspective on resilience and personal growth, feel free to reach out.

DM me or visit lauren-murrell.com for more.
